title: 90¢ Soft Serve Ice Cream
description: Enjoy discounted soft serve ice cream at participating Carvel locations.

title: 42nd India Day Parade and Festival
description: A parade celebrating Indian culture with food, booths, and cultural programs.
address: Madison Ave from E 38th to E 27th St

title: Bomb's Annual Small Press Flea
description: A market featuring small press publications and vendors, taking place at Amant in East Williamsburg.

title: The Big Aussie BBQ
description: A barbecue event at Old Stone House in Park Slope, featuring Australian food and culture.

title: Super Moon Pop-Up Market
description: A market featuring local vendors and crafts at Caffeine Underground in Bushwick.

title: Black Vegfest
description: A festival celebrating Black vegan culture and cuisine at Lincoln Terrace Park in Crown Heights.

title: The Blerd Spot
description: An event featuring games and activities for the Black nerd community at Wonderville in Bushwick.

title: Jersey City Night Market
description: A night market featuring local vendors and food at Journal Square-Magnolia Landing.

title: 64th Annual Jersey City Puerto Rican Heritage Arts + Culture Festival and Parade
description: A celebration of Puerto Rican culture with arts, crafts, and performances.

title: Myrtle Avenue Summer Nights
description: An evening of free live music, activities, and fun for the whole family featuring music from Rome Neal's Banana Puddin' Jazz, Jem Bleu at Corkscrew & DJ Del, along with family-friendly activities along Myrtle Avenue and the Myrtle Plaza.
address: Fort Greene and Clinton Hill, Brooklyn
